00030 #include "QuadLagrangeShape.hpp"

00036 EntityTopology QuadLagrangeShape::element_topology() const
00037   { return QUADRILATERAL; }
00038   
00039 int QuadLagrangeShape::num_nodes() const
00040   { return 9; }
00041 
00042 void QuadLagrangeShape::coefficients( Sample loc,
00043                                       NodeSet nodeset,
00044                                       double* coeff_out,
00045                                       size_t* indices_out,
00046                                       size_t& num_coeff,
00047                                       MsqError& err ) const
00048 {
00049   if (!nodeset.have_any_mid_node()) {
00050     LinearQuadrilateral::coefficients( loc, nodeset, coeff_out, indices_out, num_coeff );
00051     return;
00052   }
00053 
00054   switch (loc.dimension) {
00055     case 0:
00056       num_coeff = 1;
00057       indices_out[0] = loc.number;
00058       coeff_out[0] = 1.0;
00059       break;
00060     case 1:
00061       coeff_out[0] = coeff_out[1] = coeff_out[2] =
00062       coeff_out[3] = coeff_out[4] = coeff_out[5] = 
00063       coeff_out[6] = coeff_out[7] = coeff_out[8] = 0.0;
00064       if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(loc.number)) {  
00065           // if mid-edge node is present
00066         num_coeff = 1;
00067         indices_out[0] = loc.number+4;
00068         coeff_out[0] = 1.0;
00069       }
00070       else {
00071           // If mid-edge node is not present, mapping function value
00072           // for linear edge is even weight of adjacent vertices.
00073         num_coeff = 2;
00074         indices_out[0] = loc.number;
00075         indices_out[1] = (loc.number+1)%4;
00076         coeff_out[0] = 0.5;
00077         coeff_out[1] = 0.5;
00078       }
00079       break;
00080     case 2:
00081       if (nodeset.mid_face_node(0)) { // if quad center node is present
00082         num_coeff = 1;
00083         indices_out[0] = 8;
00084         coeff_out[0] = 1.0;
00085       } 
00086       else {
00087           // for linear element, (no mid-edge nodes), all corners contribute 1/4.
00088         num_coeff = 4;
00089         indices_out[0] = 0;
00090         indices_out[1] = 1;
00091         indices_out[2] = 2;
00092         indices_out[3] = 3;
00093         coeff_out[0] = 0.25;
00094         coeff_out[1] = 0.25;
00095         coeff_out[2] = 0.25;
00096         coeff_out[3] = 0.25;
00097           // add in contribution for any mid-edge nodes present
00098         for (int i = 0; i < 4; ++i) { // for each edge
00099           if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(i))
00100           {
00101             indices_out[num_coeff] = i+4;
00102             coeff_out[num_coeff] = 0.5;
00103             coeff_out[ i     ] -= 0.25;
00104             coeff_out[(i+1)%4] -= 0.25;
00105             ++num_coeff;
00106           }
00107         }
00108       }
00109       break;
00110     default:
00111       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT,
00112                   "Request for dimension %d mapping function value"
00113                   "for a quadrilateral element", loc.dimension);
00114   }
00115 }

00117 
00118 static void derivatives_at_corner( unsigned corner, 
00119                                    NodeSet nodeset,
00120                                    size_t* vertices,
00121                                    MsqVector<2>* derivs,
00122                                    size_t& num_vtx )
00123 {
00124   static const unsigned xi_adj_corners[]  = { 1, 0, 3, 2 };
00125   static const unsigned xi_adj_edges[]    = { 0, 0, 2, 2 };
00126   static const unsigned eta_adj_corners[] = { 3, 2, 1, 0 };
00127   static const unsigned eta_adj_edges[]   = { 3, 1, 1, 3 };
00128   
00129   static const double corner_xi[]  = { -1,  1,  1, -1 }; // xi values by corner
00130   static const double corner_eta[] = { -1, -1,  1,  1 }; // eta values by corner
00131   static const double other_xi[]   = {  1, -1, -1,  1 }; // xi values for adjacent corner in xi direction
00132   static const double other_eta[]  = {  1,  1, -1, -1 }; // eta values for adjcent corner in eta direction
00133   static const double mid_xi[]     = {  2, -2, -2,  2 }; // xi values for mid-node in xi direction
00134   static const double mid_eta[]    = {  2,  2, -2, -2 }; // eta values for mid-node in eta direction
00135   
00136   num_vtx = 3;
00137   vertices[0] = corner;
00138   vertices[1] = xi_adj_corners[corner];
00139   vertices[2] = eta_adj_corners[corner];
00140 
00141   derivs[0][0] = corner_xi [corner];
00142   derivs[0][1] = corner_eta[corner];
00143   derivs[1][0] = other_xi  [corner];
00144   derivs[1][1] = 0.0;
00145   derivs[2][0] = 0.0;
00146   derivs[2][1] = other_eta [corner];
00147 
00148   if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(xi_adj_edges[corner])) {
00149     vertices[num_vtx] = 4 + xi_adj_edges[corner];
00150     derivs[num_vtx][0] = 2.0*mid_xi[corner];
00151     derivs[num_vtx][1] = 0.0;
00152     derivs[0][0] -= mid_xi[corner];
00153     derivs[1][0] -= mid_xi[corner];
00154     ++num_vtx;
00155   }
00156 
00157   if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(eta_adj_edges[corner])) {
00158     vertices[num_vtx] = 4 + eta_adj_edges[corner];
00159     derivs[num_vtx][0] = 0.0;
00160     derivs[num_vtx][1] = 2.0*mid_eta[corner];
00161     derivs[0][1] -= mid_eta[corner];
00162     derivs[2][1] -= mid_eta[corner];
00163     ++num_vtx;
00164   }
00165 }
00166 
00167 static void derivatives_at_mid_edge( unsigned edge, 
00168                                      NodeSet nodeset,
00169                                      size_t* vertices,
00170                                      MsqVector<2>* derivs,
00171                                      size_t& num_vtx )
00172 {
00173   static const double values[][9] = { {-0.5, -0.5, 0.5,  0.5, -1.0,  2.0,  1.0,  2.0,  4.0},
00174                                       {-0.5,  0.5, 0.5, -0.5, -2.0,  1.0, -2.0, -1.0, -4.0},
00175                                       {-0.5, -0.5, 0.5,  0.5, -1.0, -2.0,  1.0, -2.0, -4.0},
00176                                       {-0.5,  0.5, 0.5, -0.5,  2.0,  1.0,  2.0, -1.0,  4.0} };
00177   static const double edge_values[][2] = { {-1,  1},
00178                                            {-1,  1},
00179                                            { 1, -1},
00180                                            { 1, -1} }; 
00181   const unsigned prev_corner = edge;           // index of start vertex of edge
00182   const unsigned next_corner = (edge+1)%4;     // index of end vertex of edge
00183   const unsigned is_eta_edge = edge % 2;       // edge is xi = +/- 0
00184   const unsigned is_xi_edge  = 1 - is_eta_edge;// edge is eta = +/- 0
00185   //const unsigned mid_edge_node = edge + 4;     // mid-edge node index
00186   const unsigned prev_opposite = (prev_corner+3)%4; // index of corner adjacent to prev_corner
00187   const unsigned next_opposite = (next_corner+1)%4; // index of corner adjacent to next_corner;
00188  
00189     // First do derivatives along edge (e.g. wrt xi if edge is eta = +/-1)
00190   num_vtx = 2;
00191   vertices[0] = prev_corner;
00192   vertices[1] = next_corner;
00193   derivs[0][is_eta_edge] = edge_values[edge][0];
00194   derivs[0][is_xi_edge]  = 0.0;
00195   derivs[1][is_eta_edge] = edge_values[edge][1];
00196   derivs[1][is_xi_edge]  = 0.0;
00197     // That's it for the edge-direction derivatives.  No other vertices contribute.
00198     
00199     // Next handle the linear element case.  Handle this as a special case first,
00200     // so the generalized solution doesn't impact performance for linear elements
00201     // too much.
00202   if (!nodeset.have_any_mid_node()) {
00203     num_vtx = 4;
00204     vertices[2] = prev_opposite;
00205     vertices[3] = next_opposite;
00206     derivs[0][is_xi_edge] = values[edge][prev_corner];
00207     derivs[1][is_xi_edge] = values[edge][next_corner];
00208     derivs[2][is_xi_edge] = values[edge][prev_opposite];
00209     derivs[2][is_eta_edge] = 0.0;
00210     derivs[3][is_xi_edge] = values[edge][next_opposite];
00211     derivs[3][is_eta_edge] = 0.0;
00212     return;
00213   }
00214   
00215     // Initial (linear) contribution for each corner
00216   double v[4] = { values[edge][0], 
00217                   values[edge][1], 
00218                   values[edge][2], 
00219                   values[edge][3] };
00220 
00221     // If mid-face node is present
00222   double v8 = 0.0;
00223   if (nodeset.mid_face_node(0)) {
00224     v8 = values[edge][8];
00225     vertices[num_vtx] = 8;
00226     derivs[num_vtx][is_eta_edge] = 0.0;
00227     derivs[num_vtx][is_xi_edge] = v8;
00228     v[0] -= 0.25 * v8;
00229     v[1] -= 0.25 * v8;
00230     v[2] -= 0.25 * v8;
00231     v[3] -= 0.25 * v8;
00232     ++num_vtx;
00233   }
00234 
00235     // If mid-edge nodes are present
00236   for (unsigned i = 0; i < 4; ++i) {
00237     if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(i)) {
00238       const double value = values[edge][i+4] - 0.5 * v8;
00239       if (fabs(value) > 0.125) {
00240         v[ i     ] -= 0.5 * value;
00241         v[(i+1)%4] -= 0.5 * value;
00242         vertices[num_vtx] = i+4;
00243         derivs[num_vtx][is_eta_edge] = 0.0;
00244         derivs[num_vtx][is_xi_edge] = value;
00245         ++num_vtx;
00246       }
00247     }
00248   }
00249 
00250     // update values for adjacent corners
00251   derivs[0][is_xi_edge] = v[prev_corner];
00252   derivs[1][is_xi_edge] = v[next_corner];
00253     // do other two corners
00254   if (fabs(v[prev_opposite]) > 0.125) {
00255     vertices[num_vtx] = prev_opposite;
00256     derivs[num_vtx][is_eta_edge] = 0.0;
00257     derivs[num_vtx][is_xi_edge] = v[prev_opposite];
00258     ++num_vtx;
00259   }
00260   if (fabs(v[next_opposite]) > 0.125) {
00261     vertices[num_vtx] = next_opposite;
00262     derivs[num_vtx][is_eta_edge] = 0.0;
00263     derivs[num_vtx][is_xi_edge] = v[next_opposite];
00264     ++num_vtx;
00265   }
00266 }
00267 
00268 
00269 static void derivatives_at_mid_elem( NodeSet nodeset,
00270                                      size_t* vertices,
00271                                      MsqVector<2>* derivs,
00272                                      size_t& num_vtx )
00273 {
00274     // fast linear case
00275     // This is provided as an optimization for linear elements.
00276     // If this block of code were removed, the general-case code
00277     // below should produce the same result.
00278   if (!nodeset.have_any_mid_node()) {
00279     num_vtx = 4;
00280     vertices[0] = 0; derivs[0][0] = -0.5; derivs[0][1] = -0.5;
00281     vertices[1] = 1; derivs[1][0] =  0.5; derivs[1][1] = -0.5;
00282     vertices[2] = 2; derivs[2][0] =  0.5; derivs[2][1] =  0.5;
00283     vertices[3] = 3; derivs[3][0] = -0.5; derivs[3][1] =  0.5;
00284     return;
00285   }
00286   
00287   num_vtx = 0;
00288   
00289     // N_0
00290   if (!nodeset.both_edge_nodes(0,3)) {  // if eiter adjacent mid-edge node is missing
00291     vertices[num_vtx] = 0;
00292     derivs[num_vtx][0] = nodeset.mid_edge_node(3) ? 0.0 : -0.5;
00293     derivs[num_vtx][1] = nodeset.mid_edge_node(0) ? 0.0 : -0.5;
00294     ++num_vtx;
00295   }
00296   
00297     // N_1
00298   if (!nodeset.both_edge_nodes(0,1)) {  // if eiter adjacent mid-edge node is missing
00299     vertices[num_vtx] = 1;
00300     derivs[num_vtx][0] = nodeset.mid_edge_node(1) ? 0.0 :  0.5;
00301     derivs[num_vtx][1] = nodeset.mid_edge_node(0) ? 0.0 : -0.5;
00302     ++num_vtx;
00303   }
00304   
00305     // N_2
00306   if (!nodeset.both_edge_nodes(1,2)) {  // if eiter adjacent mid-edge node is missing
00307     vertices[num_vtx] = 2;
00308     derivs[num_vtx][0] = nodeset.mid_edge_node(1) ? 0.0 :  0.5;
00309     derivs[num_vtx][1] = nodeset.mid_edge_node(2) ? 0.0 :  0.5;
00310     ++num_vtx;
00311   }
00312   
00313     // N_3
00314   if (!nodeset.both_edge_nodes(2,3)) {  // if eiter adjacent mid-edge node is missing
00315     vertices[num_vtx] = 3;
00316     derivs[num_vtx][0] = nodeset.mid_edge_node(3) ? 0.0 : -0.5;
00317     derivs[num_vtx][1] = nodeset.mid_edge_node(2) ? 0.0 :  0.5;
00318     ++num_vtx;
00319   }
00320   
00321     // N_4
00322   if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(0)) {
00323     vertices[num_vtx] = 4;
00324     derivs[num_vtx][0] =  0.0;
00325     derivs[num_vtx][1] = -1.0;
00326     ++num_vtx;
00327   }
00328   
00329     // N_5
00330   if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(1)) {
00331     vertices[num_vtx] = 5;
00332     derivs[num_vtx][0] =  1.0;
00333     derivs[num_vtx][1] =  0.0;
00334     ++num_vtx;
00335   }
00336   
00337     // N_6
00338   if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(2)) {
00339     vertices[num_vtx] = 6;
00340     derivs[num_vtx][0] =  0.0;
00341     derivs[num_vtx][1] =  1.0;
00342     ++num_vtx;
00343   }
00344   
00345     // N_7
00346   if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(3)) {
00347     vertices[num_vtx] = 7;
00348     derivs[num_vtx][0] = -1.0;
00349     derivs[num_vtx][1] =  0.0;
00350     ++num_vtx;
00351   }
00352   
00353     // N_8 (mid-quad node) never contributes to Jacobian at element center!!!
00354 }
00355 
00356 void QuadLagrangeShape::derivatives( Sample loc,
00357                                      NodeSet nodeset,
00358                                      size_t* vertex_indices_out,
00359                                      MsqVector<2>* d_coeff_d_xi_out,
00360                                      size_t& num_vtx,
00361                                      MsqError& err ) const
00362 {
00363   if (!nodeset.have_any_mid_node()) {
00364     LinearQuadrilateral::derivatives( loc, nodeset, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00365     return;
00366   }
00367 
00368   switch (loc.dimension) {
00369     case 0:
00370       derivatives_at_corner( loc.number, nodeset, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00371       break;
00372     case 1:
00373       derivatives_at_mid_edge( loc.number, nodeset, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00374       break;
00375     case 2:
00376       derivatives_at_mid_elem( nodeset, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00377       break;
00378     default:
00379       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid/unsupported logical dimension",MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00380   }
00381 }
00382 
00383 
00384 void QuadLagrangeShape::ideal( Sample , 
00385                                MsqMatrix<3,2>& J,
00386                                MsqError&  ) const
00387 {
00388   J(0,0) = J(1,1) = 1.0;
00389   J(0,1) = J(1,0) = 0.0;
00390   J(2,0) = J(2,1) = 0.0;
00391 }
